pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, December 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, December 1, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the World AIDS Day Flag Raising Ceremony and will deliver remarks.

Parliament Hill Lawn
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca


Media appearance

6:00 p.m. ET – Live – CTV Toy Mountain Event and interview with Tom Brown.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
